description: This Dart source file defines the main Flutter application for a web-based wiki-to-graph converter. It includes initialization, theme setup, state management, and UI components for user interaction, submitting URLs or raw text, and displaying the resulting graph visualization or raw JSON result.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter app, sets up theme and providers.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: Manages application state, user input, API interactions, and results.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Main page containing header, input form, and results display.

classes.name: _HealthIndicator
classes.description: Periodic check to monitor backend service health.

classes.name: _ErrorBanner
classes.description: Displays error messages to the user.

classes.name: _LoadingBanner
classes.description: Displays a loading indicator during processing.

classes.name: _ResultsSection
classes.description: Shows conversion results and raw JSON if available.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter app, loads environment variables, and runs MyApp.

methods.name: _hex
methods.description: Converts hex string into a Color object.

methods.name: setMode
methods.description: Sets the current input mode (URL or text).

methods.name: setUrl
methods.description: Updates the URL input field value.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Updates the raw content input field value.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Submits user input to the backend API for conversion, handles retries and updates results.
